price: Kuma da yawa daga mutãnen ƙarni Muka halakar a gabãninsu sũ (waɗandaMuka halakar) in ne mafi kyaun kãyan ãki da magãnã.*
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا
footnotes: * Kãyan ɗãki na jin dãɗi kamar gadãje da kujeri da kãyan cin abinci. Magãnã kuwa ita ce wurin da ake ganĩ ga mutum kamar tufãfinsa da sũrar jikinsa da dukan abin gani daga gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari'yan
